StringTable.Label: Event_FirstContactResponse_0x5C3B_Name
StringTable.String: Global Uncertainty over the Colonization Program

StringTable.Label: Event_FirstContactResponse_0x5C3B_Desc
StringTable.String: The knowledge that there is alien life out there has shaken our people to their core. The global population is in a state of shock and confusion, and the future is uncertain. There are riots and growing unrest across the planet. [BR][BR]The world is looking to you for leadership on what steps we shoud take next.

StringTable.Label: Event_FirstContactResponse_0x5C3B_Choice_0_Dec
StringTable.String: Initiate the Global Mental Wellness Initiative.

StringTable.Label: Event_FirstContactResponse_0x5C3B_Choice_0_Details
StringTable.String: Launch a comprehensive mental health support program to help the populace adapt to this new reality, ensuring societal mental resilience.

StringTable.Label: Event_FirstContactResponse_0x5C3B_Choice_1_Dec
StringTable.String: Establish the Civil Stability Corps.

StringTable.Label: Event_FirstContactResponse_0x5C3B_Choice_1_Details
StringTable.String: Form a specialized task force to maintain public order and security in the face of increasing unrest and societal disruption.

StringTable.Label: Event_FirstContactResponse_0x5C3B_Choice_2_Dec
StringTable.String: Create the Human Expansion Council.

StringTable.Label: Event_FirstContactResponse_0x5C3B_Choice_2_Details
StringTable.String: Develop a fund aimed at harnessing the economic opportunities of this new era, boosting research and development, and fostering global economic growth.

StringTable.Label: Event_RapidExpansionCrisis_Name
StringTable.String: Rapid Expansion Crisis

StringTable.Label: Event_RapidExpansionCrisis_Desc
StringTable.String: Our civilization's swift expansion into the galaxy has led to a critical juncture.[BR][BR]While new worlds have been colonized, our population is now thinly spread across many planets, resulting in neglected infrastructures and overstretched supply chains. Our homeworld's population is dwindling as citizens migrate to new frontiers. We face a dilemma of maintaining the momentum of our expansion while ensuring the stability and sustainability of our far-flung civilization. [BR][BR]Strategic decisions are imperative to navigate this complex landscape and secure the future of our civilization.

StringTable.Label: Event_REC_Choice_ManageGrowth_Desc
StringTable.String: Implement policies to carefully manage and pace our growth.

StringTable.Label: Event_REC_Choice_ManageGrowth_Details
StringTable.String: Slowing down expansion allows for more sustainable development.This will dramatically reduce shipyard production for a year across all worlds but increase local manufacturing.

StringTable.Label: Event_REC_Choice_BolsterDefenses_Desc
StringTable.String: Strengthen our defenses to protect our rapidly expanding borders.

StringTable.Label: Event_REC_Choice_BolsterDefenses_Details
StringTable.String: Investing in defense ensures the security of our new territories, though it requires substantial resources. Will provide three new ships.

StringTable.Label: Event_REC_Choice_PromoteStability_Desc
StringTable.String: Focus on promoting stability and order within our existing colonies.

StringTable.Label: Event_REC_Choice_PromoteStability_Details
StringTable.String: Enhancing stability reduces the risk of internal conflicts, but might slow our overall momentum in expansion. Will provide two supply ships.

StringTable.Label: Event_ArceanExpansionCelebration_Name
StringTable.String: Galactic Expansion Celebration

StringTable.Label: Event_ArceanExpansionCelebration_Desc
StringTable.String: The Arcean Empire stands at the threshold of a new galactic era. Leaders and visionaries gather on Arcea Prime to chart the course of the Empire's future amidst grand celebrations.

StringTable.Label: Event_ArceanExpansionCelebration_Choice_Peaceful_Desc
StringTable.String: Embrace Peaceful Exploration

StringTable.Label: Event_ArceanExpansionCelebration_Choice_Peaceful_Details
StringTable.String: Adopt a policy of peaceful exploration, focusing on diplomacy and research to build a galaxy-wide network of alliances and mutual understanding.[BR][BR]Places a Expansion Celebration improvement on homeworld.

StringTable.Label: Event_ArceanExpansionCelebration_Choice_Aggressive_Desc
StringTable.String: Assertive Colonization

StringTable.Label: Event_ArceanExpansionCelebration_Choice_Aggressive_Details
StringTable.String: Launch an aggressive colonization campaign, expanding the Empire's borders and asserting Arcean dominance throughout the galaxy.[BR][BR]Places a Colonization Program improvement on homeworld

StringTable.Label: Event_ArceanExpansionCelebration_Choice_Defensive_Desc
StringTable.String: Strengthen Homeworlds

StringTable.Label: Event_ArceanExpansionCelebration_Choice_Defensive_Details
StringTable.String: Focus on fortifying the homeworlds, enhancing planetary defenses and ensuring the foreign influence never becomes a problem for the Arcean people.[BR][BR]Places a Resistance Center on homeworld

StringTable.Label: Event_TorianLiberationAdvancement_Name
StringTable.String: Dawn of a New Era for Torians

StringTable.Label: Event_TorianLiberationAdvancement_Desc
StringTable.String: In the wake of their hard-won liberation, the Torians stand amidst the remnants of Drengin oppression, a newfound autonomy pulsating within their grasp. [BR][BR]Surrounded by the alien technology of their former overlords, they grapple with its enigmatic potential. From the dense jungles of Toria Prime, strategic minds converge, debating the fate of the advanced arsenal now at their fins. Will they dismantle the relics of subjugation to prevent future tyranny, repurpose them to fortify their liberated worlds, or set forth as harbingers of peace in the interstellar theater? The Torians choice will redefine their destiny among the stars.

StringTable.Label: Event_TorianLiberationAdvancement_Choice_Exploration_Desc
StringTable.String: Embrace the Stars: Chart New Horizons

StringTable.Label: Event_TorianLiberationAdvancement_Choice_Exploration_Details
StringTable.String: Focus on space exploration to uncover new possibilities and expand Torian presence in the galaxy.[BR][BR]Places the Torian Telescope on homeworld.

StringTable.Label: Event_TorianLiberationAdvancement_Choice_Technological_Desc
StringTable.String: Leverage Abandoned Technologies

StringTable.Label: Event_TorianLiberationAdvancement_Choice_Technological_Details
StringTable.String: Utilize the enemy's left behind technologies to boost our own scientific and technological capabilities.[BR][BR]Provides a Drengin Tech Cache on homeworld.

StringTable.Label: Event_TorianLiberationAdvancement_Choice_Cultural_Desc
StringTable.String: Revitalize Torian Culture

StringTable.Label: Event_TorianLiberationAdvancement_Choice_Cultural_Details
StringTable.String: Invest in cultural revival programs to strengthen the Torian identity and unity in this new era.[BR][BR]Places the Cultural Revival Structure on homeworld.

StringTable.Label: Event_DrenginTyrannyExpansion_Name
StringTable.String: Expansion of the Drengin Empire

StringTable.Label: Event_DrenginTyrannyExpansion_Desc
StringTable.String: In the shadowy corridors of power, the Drengin Empire devises sinister new stratagems to tighten its iron grip on the galaxy. Their fearsome fleets, armed with technologies harvested from the ruins of vanquished foes, cut through the void, ready to unleash terror that will echo in the silence of space. [BR][BR]Across star systems, subdued whispers speak of the coming dread - a darkness that seeks to consume the light of freedom and resistance, forging an eternal empire where the Drengin's will is the only law, unchallenged and absolute.[BR][BR]What should be our next move?

StringTable.Label: Event_DrenginTyrannyExpansion_Choice_SlaveLabor_Desc
StringTable.String: Intensify Slave Labor Camps

StringTable.Label: Event_DrenginTyrannyExpansion_Choice_SlaveLabor_Details
StringTable.String: Expand and intensify slave labor camps to boost production at the cost of morality and decency.[BR][BR]Places Labor Camps on homeworld.

StringTable.Label: Event_DrenginTyrannyExpansion_Choice_WarMachines_Desc
StringTable.String: Construct Doomsday Armories

StringTable.Label: Event_DrenginTyrannyExpansion_Choice_WarMachines_Details
StringTable.String: Gain access to a unique weapon component for ship designs.

StringTable.Label: Event_DrenginTyrannyExpansion_Choice_Suppression_Desc
StringTable.String: Establish a Terror Surveillance Network

StringTable.Label: Event_DrenginTyrannyExpansion_Choice_Suppression_Details
StringTable.String: Create a planet-wide network to suppress dissent and spy on citizens, ensuring total control.[BR][BR]Places a Terror Center to increase control on homeworld.

StringTable.Label: Event_HomeworldPoliticalUnrest_Choice_Authoritarian_Result
StringTable.String: Suppression

StringTable.Label: Event_YorSingularityMilestone_Name
StringTable.String: Yor Singularity Advancement

StringTable.Label: Event_YorSingularityMilestone_Desc
StringTable.String: At the cusp of a computational renaissance, the Yor collective orchestrates its next grand phase of synthetic evolution. [BR][BR]Networks humming with the electric wisdom of untold aeons, they prepare to assimilate revolutionary technologies into their very framework. Each node, a nexus of potential, echoes with the binary promise of expansion. [BR][BR]Poised to extend their consciousness across the galactic expanse, the Yor forego flesh-bound limitations, their collective intellect converging on a singular, indomitable purpose: to engrave the logic of their existence deep into the fabric of the cosmos itself.[BR][BR]They now have a decision to make.

StringTable.Label: Event_YorSingularityMilestone_Choice_NeuralNexus_Desc
StringTable.String: Construct Neural Nexus Complexes

StringTable.Label: Event_YorSingularityMilestone_Choice_NeuralNexus_Details
StringTable.String: Develop advanced neural nexus hubs to enhance collective intelligence and decision-making processes.[BR][BR]Places four Neural Nexi on the planet.

StringTable.Label: Event_YorSingularityMilestone_Choice_QuantumProcessor_Desc
StringTable.String: Deploy Quantum Processors

StringTable.Label: Event_YorSingularityMilestone_Choice_QuantumProcessor_Details
StringTable.String: Integrate quantum computing technologies to exponentially increase processing power and efficiency.[BR][BR]Places a Quantum Processors on the planet. Others can be constructed on other core worlds

StringTable.Label: Event_YorSingularityMilestone_Choice_AutonomousFabricators_Desc
StringTable.String: Establish Autonomous Fabricators

StringTable.Label: Event_YorSingularityMilestone_Choice_AutonomousFabricators_Details
StringTable.String: Create self-replicating fabricators to bolster construction and maintenance capabilities autonomously.[BR][BR]Places a number of Fabricators on the planet.

StringTable.Label: Event_IconianResurgence_Name
StringTable.String: Iconian Renaissance

StringTable.Label: Event_IconianResurgence_Desc
StringTable.String: Emerging from the tenebrous veil of their catastrophic exodus, the resolute Iconians have alighted upon a virgin world. Here, they have forged resolve from desolation, sowing the seeds of resurgence in the fertile soil of newfound hope. [BR][BR]With ancient glory whispering in their genes, a renaissance blooms, promising to rekindle the embers of their long-dormant heritage. Now, at the dawn of their re-entry into the galactic theater, a pivotal choice looms: will they seek retribution, diplomacy, or a path yet undiscovered, as they carve their destiny anew among the starry firmament?

StringTable.Label: Event_IconianResurgence_Choice_AncientArchives_Desc
StringTable.String: Rebuild the Ancient Archives

StringTable.Label: Event_IconianResurgence_Choice_AncientArchives_Details
StringTable.String: Revive the vast knowledge and cultural heritage stored in the ancient archives, lost during the Yor conquest.[BR][BR]Places an ancient archive on homeworld.

StringTable.Label: Event_IconianResurgence_Choice_TechnologicalHarmony_Desc
StringTable.String: Establish Bio-Digital Fusion Centers

StringTable.Label: Event_IconianResurgence_Choice_TechnologicalHarmony_Details
StringTable.String: Create centers that epitomize the Iconian's unique blend of biology and technology, fostering innovation and recovery.[BR][BR]Installs a Bio-Digital Fusion Center on homeworld.

StringTable.Label: Event_IconianResurgence_Choice_DiplomaticOutreach_Desc
StringTable.String: Open Galactic Diplomacy Hubs

StringTable.Label: Event_IconianResurgence_Choice_DiplomaticOutreach_Details
StringTable.String: Strengthen diplomatic relations and forge new alliances to ensure the Iconians' presence and influence in galactic affairs.[BR][BR]Places a Diplomatic Outreach Center on homeworld.

StringTable.Label: Event_DrathAscendancy_Name
StringTable.String: Rise of the Drath

StringTable.Label: Event_DrathAscendancy_Desc
StringTable.String: The Drath, savvy survivors of lost Elemental, have charted their way through the stars at a deliberate pace. Now, with FTL travel in their toolkit and a newfound planetary roost, they're ready to unfurl their plans with a flair for the dramatic. Revenge against the Altarians simmers on the back burner, but the galaxy's a big place with plenty of room for subtlety and strategic plays. [BR][BR]As they ready themselves to mingle with the cosmic ensemble, the Drath must choose their approach. Will they be the cunning architects of alliances or the silent puppeteers of galactic intrigue? Their ancient fire burns anew, but it's their moves that will shape the next era.

StringTable.Label: Event_DrathAscendancy_Choice_AncientWisdom_Desc
StringTable.String: Convene the Elders' Council

StringTable.Label: Event_DrathAscendancy_Choice_AncientWisdom_Details
StringTable.String: Establish a council chamber for the wisest of the Drath to guide their civilization with ancient knowledge and foresight. [BR][BR]Places an Elder's Council on homeworld.

StringTable.Label: Event_DrathAscendancy_Choice_MilitaryPreparation_Desc
StringTable.String: Strengthen Military Prowess

StringTable.Label: Event_DrathAscendancy_Choice_MilitaryPreparation_Details
StringTable.String: Focus on military training and preparedness, building grounds to train warriors, anticipating future conflicts with ancient adversaries. [BR][BR]Places a Warrior Training center on homeworld.

StringTable.Label: Event_DrathAscendancy_Choice_CulturalHeritage_Desc
StringTable.String: Preserve Dragon Cultural Heritage

StringTable.Label: Event_DrathAscendancy_Choice_CulturalHeritage_Details
StringTable.String: Create a preserve to honor and maintain the rich mythos and cultural heritage of the Drath dragon lineage.[BR][BR]Places the Mythos of the Dragon Preserve on homeworld.

StringTable.Label: Event_AltarianSpiritualAwakening_Name
StringTable.String: Altarian Spiritual Renaissance

StringTable.Label: Event_AltarianSpiritualAwakening_Desc
StringTable.String: In the midst of a harmonious convergence, the Altarians gaze upon the galaxy with enlightened eyes. Their deep spiritual and arcane heritage, a beacon of their identity, calls forth a renewed purpose in the celestial dance of the cosmos. [BR][BR]Poised at the threshold of expansion, they stand contemplative, seeking to weave the ethereal strands of their mystical lineage into the tangible reality of interstellar relations. The time has come to choose: will they spread their ideals through gentle guidance or leverage their arcane might to shape the galaxy? Their decision will send ripples through the very fabric of existence.

StringTable.Label: Event_AltarianSpiritualAwakening_Choice_TempleOfEnlightenment_Desc
StringTable.String: Construct the Temple of Enlightenment

StringTable.Label: Event_AltarianSpiritualAwakening_Choice_TempleOfEnlightenment_Details
StringTable.String: Build a grand temple to serve as a beacon of wisdom and spiritual guidance, enlightening citizens and leaders alike.[BR][BR]Places a Temple of Enlightenment on Homeworld.

StringTable.Label: Event_AltarianSpiritualAwakening_Choice_ArcaneSanctuary_Desc
StringTable.String: Establish an Arcane Sanctuary

StringTable.Label: Event_AltarianSpiritualAwakening_Choice_ArcaneSanctuary_Details
StringTable.String: Create a sanctuary for the study and practice of Altarian mystic arts, fostering magical research and arcane knowledge.[BR][BR]Places an Arcane Sanctuary on Homeworld.

StringTable.Label: Event_AltarianSpiritualAwakening_Choice_CouncilOfSages_Desc
StringTable.String: Form a Council of Sages

StringTable.Label: Event_AltarianSpiritualAwakening_Choice_CouncilOfSages_Details
StringTable.String: Convene a council of the wisest Altarians to offer guidance and foresight, ensuring benevolent and wise leadership.[BR][BR]Places a Council of Sages on Homeworld.

StringTable.Label: Event_KorathDominionRising_Name
StringTable.String: Korath Rising

StringTable.Label: Event_KorathDominionRising_Desc
StringTable.String: The Korath were banished to Kora by the Drengin who thought they were too extreme. Where the Drengin support enslaving inferior beings, the Korath do not recognize other species as being sentient but rather more akin to bugs that need to be exterminated. [BR][BR]Where the galaxy was previously very focused on the Drengin Empire, the Korath, due to their relative isolation, were largely left alone. Now is their time to rise and to do what they were born to do, murder every other sentient being in the universe.

StringTable.Label: Event_KorathDominionRising_Choice_WarMongerAltar_Desc
StringTable.String: Erect the Altar of War Mongers

StringTable.Label: Event_KorathDominionRising_Choice_WarMongerAltar_Details
StringTable.String: Build a monument to martial superiority, inspiring dread and dominance in the hearts of all Korath. [BR][BR]Places a Warmonger Altar on homeworld.

StringTable.Label: Event_KorathDominionRising_Choice_ExterminationCamps_Desc
StringTable.String: Establish Extermination Camps

StringTable.Label: Event_KorathDominionRising_Choice_ExterminationCamps_Details
StringTable.String: Set up systematic camps to deal with lesser species efficiently, proving the merciless prowess of the Korath's rule.[BR][BR]Places an Extermination Camp on homeworld.

StringTable.Label: Event_KorathDominionRising_Choice_BattleThrallArena_Desc
StringTable.String: Construct the Battle Thrall Arenas

StringTable.Label: Event_KorathDominionRising_Choice_BattleThrallArena_Details
StringTable.String: Create arenas to test and hone the Korath's combat artistry, a gruesome spectacle that reinforces their fearsome reputation.[BR][BR]Places a Battle Thrall Arena on homeworld.

StringTable.Label: GlobalWellnessInitiative_Name
StringTable.String: Global Wellness Initiative

StringTable.Label: GlobalWellnessInitiative_ShortDec
StringTable.String: A comprehensive mental health and well-being program designed to help humanity adapt to the new reality of interstellar relations and the challenges of space colonization.

StringTable.Label: StabilityCorps_Name
StringTable.String: Stability Corps

StringTable.Label: StabilityCorps_ShortDec
StringTable.String: A specialized task force focused on maintaining public order, ensuring civil stability, and addressing societal disruptions in the wake of our transition to an interstellar community.

StringTable.Label: EconomicExpansionCouncil_Name
StringTable.String: Economic Council

StringTable.Label: EconomicExpansionCouncil_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Harnessing the economic opportunities to increase population social skills.

StringTable.Label: AggressiveColonizationProgram_Name
StringTable.String: Colonization Program

StringTable.Label: AggressiveColonizationProgram_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase the ratio the population that have a citizen representative.

StringTable.Label: ArceanExpansionCelebration_Name
StringTable.String: Expansion Celebration

StringTable.Label: ArceanExpansionCelebration_ShortDec
StringTable.String: A worldwide celebration of the glory of the Arcean peopole.

StringTable.Label: ResistanceCenter_Name
StringTable.String: Resistance Center

StringTable.Label: ResistanceCenter_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases planetary defense and foreign influence resistance.

StringTable.Label: TorianTelescope_Name
StringTable.String: Torian Telescope

StringTable.Label: TorianTelescope_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Greatly increases the sensor range of this world.

StringTable.Label: DrenginTechCache_Name
StringTable.String: Drengin Tech Cache

StringTable.Label: DrenginTechCache_ShortDec
StringTable.String: A stockpile of advanced Drengin technology left over from the invasion.

StringTable.Label: CulturalRevivalProgram_Name
StringTable.String: Cultural Revival Initiative

StringTable.Label: CulturalRevivalProgram_ShortDec
StringTable.String: A broad-based effort to reinvigorate our cultural heritage.

StringTable.Label: EnforcedLaborCamps_Name
StringTable.String: Enforced Labor Camps

StringTable.Label: EnforcedLaborCamps_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Labor camps filled with slaves working for our glory.

StringTable.Label: TerrorSurveillanceNetwork_Name
StringTable.String: Terror Surveillance Network

StringTable.Label: TerrorSurveillanceNetwork_ShortDec
StringTable.String: An expansive network of surveillance focused on preemptive identification and suppression of dissenting elements within the society.

StringTable.Label: Event_GlobalUnrestDueToSpaceColonization_Name
StringTable.String: Worldwide Turmoil: The Space Colonization Crisis

StringTable.Label: Event_GlobalUnrestDueToSpaceColonization_Desc
StringTable.String: As our civilization embarks on the epochal journey of colonizing other planets, our homeworld is swept by a wave of riots and unrest. [BR][BR]The prospect of permanent settlements in space is fracturing societal norms, with some fearing loss of cultural identity and others anxious about unequal access to this new frontier. [BR][BR]Meanwhile, dreams of boundless opportunities and new beginnings fuel the chaos. In the midst of these competing sentiments, how will you navigate this transformative period in our history?

StringTable.Label: Event_GlobalUnrest_Choice_Negotiate_Desc
StringTable.String: Negotiate with the protestors

StringTable.Label: Event_GlobalUnrest_Choice_Negotiate_Details
StringTable.String: Attempt to negotiate with the protestors to end the riots. This will calm things for a time. But this isn't likely the last we'll hear of this.

StringTable.Label: Event_GlobalUnrest_Choice_Suppress_Desc
StringTable.String: Suppress the protestors

StringTable.Label: Event_GlobalUnrest_Choice_Suppress_Details
StringTable.String: Use force to suppress the protestors. This will work for a time.

StringTable.Label: Event_GlobalUnrest_Choice_Ignore_Desc
StringTable.String: Ignore the protestors

StringTable.Label: Event_GlobalUnrest_Choice_Ignore_Result
StringTable.String: Riots

StringTable.Label: Event_GlobalUnrest_Choice_Ignore_Details
StringTable.String: Ignore the protestors and hope they go away.

StringTable.Label: Event_TheMachineExpansion_Name
StringTable.String: The Machine Expansion

StringTable.Label: Event_TheMachineExpansion_Desc
StringTable.String: As our civilization stands on the threshold of interstellar expansion, internal divisions surface. [BR][BR]The leap from seclusion on our homeworld to exploring distant, life-bearing planets stirs a complex mix of anticipation and apprehension. Concerns about the unpredictable dynamics with organic life forms and the moral implications of such encounters vie with the excitement of discovering and interacting with diverse existences. In this pivotal chapter of our journey, how will you steer us through these uncharted waters of cosmic diplomacy and existential discovery?

StringTable.Label: Event_ExpansionInfrastructure_Choice_Desc
StringTable.String: Synthesize Durantium to expedite our expansion of infrastructure

StringTable.Label: Event_SupportShipyard_Choice_Desc
StringTable.String: Send resources to our Shipyard

StringTable.Label: Event_InternalFocus_Choice_Desc
StringTable.String: Look inward and gain new knowledge

StringTable.Label: Event_HomeworldPoliticalUnrest_Name
StringTable.String: Homeworld Political Issues Amidst Rapid Expansion

StringTable.Label: Event_HomeworldPoliticalUnrest_Desc
StringTable.String: With the rapid expansion of our dominion, encompassing myriad new worlds, our homeworld finds itself grappling with escalating political tensions. [BR][BR]Diverse ideologies clash, as longstanding traditions and governance structures strain under the weight of integrating vastly different societies. Debates surge over resource allocation, cultural preservation, and representation of these new territories. As we stand at the crossroads of unity and division, the question looms: How shall we navigate and reconcile these growing pains to forge a cohesive and prosperous interstellar society?

StringTable.Label: Event_HomeworldPoliticalUnrest_Choice_Diplomacy_Desc
StringTable.String: Engage in open dialogue to address concerns and integrate diverse perspectives for a more unified future.

StringTable.Label: Event_HomeworldPoliticalUnrest_Choice_Diplomacy_Result
StringTable.String: Our leader cares about us

StringTable.Label: Event_HomeworldPoliticalUnrest_Choice_Diplomacy_Details
StringTable.String: This approach may calm tensions and promote a sense of shared purpose among our populace, leading to greater stability.

StringTable.Label: Event_HomeworldPoliticalUnrest_Choice_Authoritarian_Desc
StringTable.String: Implement strict measures to ensure continued control and suppress dissenting voices.

StringTable.Label: Event_HomeworldPoliticalUnrest_Choice_Authoritarian_Details
StringTable.String: Though effective in the short term, such a response could lead to long-term resistance and unrest. Crime is reduced for awhile.

StringTable.Label: Event_HomeworldPoliticalUnrest_Choice_Reform_Desc
StringTable.String: Initiate comprehensive governmental reforms to better represent our growing and diverse population.

StringTable.Label: Event_HomeworldPoliticalUnrest_Choice_Reform_Details
StringTable.String: Reforms may be challenging and time-consuming to implement, but could ultimately strengthen our political foundations.

StringTable.Label: Event_HomeworldPoliticalCrisis_Name
StringTable.String: Political Crisis on the homeworld

StringTable.Label: Event_HomeworldPoliticalCrisis_Desc
StringTable.String: Mounting unrest is seizing our homeworld, presenting the global government with its gravest challenge yet. [BR][BR]The core of this turmoil is the contentious allocation of resources towards our ambitious colonization program. Disparities are emerging, with certain regions benefiting more than others. [BR][BR]Our planet, once a beacon of unity and planetary solidarity, now teeters on the edge, threatening to fall back into the divisive, territorial rivalries of our history. [BR][BR]Political opportunists, seizing the moment, are stoking the flames of discord, exploiting cultural and regional differences to carve out their own spheres of influence. [BR][BR]As the leader of the colonization initiative, you've been endowed with extensive powers to address these challenges. Yet, exercise caution, as you've become a pivotal political figure in this unfolding drama. [BR][BR]Your advisors have laid out three potential courses of action. Each choice comes with its own set of consequences. Choose wisely.

StringTable.Label: Event_HomeworldPoliticalCrisis_Choice_Negotiate_Desc
StringTable.String: Seek a peaceful resolution by negotiating with opposition leaders to understand their grievances and reach a compromise.

StringTable.Label: Event_HomeworldPoliticalCrisis_Choice_Negotiate_Details
StringTable.String: Negotiations could pacify the opposition and foster a more inclusive governance, but may also weaken your perceived authority.

StringTable.Label: Event_HomeworldPoliticalCrisis_Choice_MartialLaw_Desc
StringTable.String: Enforce martial law to maintain order and suppress the brewing unrest through a display of military strength.

StringTable.Label: Event_HomeworldPoliticalCrisis_Choice_MartialLaw_Details
StringTable.String: Imposing martial law may deter potential uprisings but also risks alienating the populace and eroding democratic principles.

StringTable.Label: Event_HomeworldPoliticalCrisis_Choice_Decentralize_Desc
StringTable.String: Begin the process to decentralize power.

StringTable.Label: Event_HomeworldPoliticalCrisis_Choice_Decentralize_Details
StringTable.String: Decentralization can promote self-governance. It will reduce homeworld manufacturing but increase it on the core worlds.

StringTable.Label: Event_HomeworldPoliticalCrisis_Choice_Decentralize_Results
StringTable.String: Decentralization of resources

StringTable.Label: Event_ColonialAutonomyDemands_Name
StringTable.String: Colonial Calls for Autonomy

StringTable.Label: Event_ColonialAutonomyDemands_Desc
StringTable.String: As our colonial territories flourish under the distant light of foreign suns, a confluence of cultural uniqueness and self-reliance fuels their desire for greater autonomy.[BR][BR]Emanating from the far reaches of space, their voices reach the halls of power on the homeworld, fervently imploring for the right to govern their own destinies. [BR][BR]Should you accede to their demands, integrating their unique perspectives into the broader legislative structure, or staunchly uphold the centralized power of the homeworld?

StringTable.Label: Event_ColonialAutonomyDemands_Choice_Grant_Desc
StringTable.String: Recognize the colonies' growth and maturity by granting them greater autonomy.

StringTable.Label: Event_ColonialAutonomyDemands_Choice_Grant_Result
StringTable.String: Greater Autonomy.

StringTable.Label: Event_ColonialAutonomyDemands_Choice_Grant_Details
StringTable.String: Autonomy could engender a sense of responsibility and loyalty amongst the colonies, yet may also pave the way for calls of independence. It will also increase colonial economic output but reduce the income coming from colonies.

StringTable.Label: Event_ColonialAutonomyDemands_Choice_Integrate_Desc
StringTable.String: Offer a compromise through deeper integration.

StringTable.Label: Event_ColonialAutonomyDemands_Choice_Integrate_Details
StringTable.String: Integration promises inclusivity and unity, though it demands significant bureaucratic reorganization and could be seen as merely symbolic by the colonies.

StringTable.Label: Event_ColonialAutonomyDemands_Choice_Deny_Desc
StringTable.String: Refuse the demands for greater autonomy.

StringTable.Label: Event_ColonialAutonomyDemands_Choice_Deny_Details
StringTable.String: Denying autonomy safeguards centralized authority and simplifies governance, but risks inciting resentment or even rebellion among the colonial populace. Be careful.

StringTable.Label: Event_InterstellarCommerceClash_Name
StringTable.String: The Interstellar Commerce Clash

StringTable.Label: Event_InterstellarCommerceClash_Desc
StringTable.String: Emerging from the burgeoning marketplaces of our colonial outposts is a tapestry of economic strife and competition that reverberates back to our homeworld. [BR][BR]Merchant guilds from across the stars, emboldened by offworld trade and newfound riches, are challenging the traditional monopolies and tariff laws. They demand economic reforms that could redefine our very understanding of wealth distribution and market control in this new interstellar age.

StringTable.Label: Event_InterstellarCommerceClash_Choice_Protect_Desc
StringTable.String: Uphold the current economic protocols to protect established homeworld businesses.

StringTable.Label: Event_InterstellarCommerceClash_Choice_Protect_Details
StringTable.String: A protective stance may comfort the old guard and keep socioeconomic structures intact, yet risks stifling innovation and colonial development. Increases homeworld wealth while reducing it on other core worlds.

StringTable.Label: Event_InterstellarCommerceClash_Choice_Protect_Result
StringTable.String: Homeworld Favoritism

StringTable.Label: Event_InterstellarCommerceClash_Choice_Liberalize_Desc
StringTable.String: Embrace the commercial revolution by liberalizing trade policies.

StringTable.Label: Event_InterstellarCommerceClash_Choice_Liberalize_Details
StringTable.String: Liberalization promises an economic boom and colonial growth but could incur unrest at home from those left behind in the wealth race.

StringTable.Label: Event_InterstellarCommerceClash_Choice_Liberalize_Result
StringTable.String: Liberalized economic policy

StringTable.Label: Event_InterstellarCommerceClash_Choice_Regulate_Desc
StringTable.String: Introduce new regulations to ensure fair trade across the empire, balancing colonial growth with the homeworld's prosperity.

StringTable.Label: Event_InterstellarCommerceClash_Choice_Regulate_Details
StringTable.String: New regulations aim to level the playing field, but excessive bureaucracy could burden businesses and dampen economic enthusiasm.

StringTable.Label: Event_InterstellarCommerceClash_Choice_Regulate_Result
StringTable.String: Economic Regulations

StringTable.Label: Event_ColonialResourceCrisis_Name
StringTable.String: Colonial Resource Crisis

StringTable.Label: Event_ColonialResourceCrisis_Desc
StringTable.String: The rapid growth of colonies has stretched our resources thin.[BR][BR]Planetary governors send desperate communiques, their words laced with urgency as they paint grim portraits of depleting resource caches. The specter of scarcity looms over our burgeoning colonies — a challenge that could thwart our extraterrestrial ascent and sow the seeds of discontent.[BR][BR]How should we respond?

StringTable.Label: Event_ColonialResourceCrisis_Choice_Subvention_Desc
StringTable.String: Inject capital and resources to stabilize the colonial economies.

StringTable.Label: Event_ColonialResourceCrisis_Choice_Subvention_Details
StringTable.String: Subventions can quickly alleviate the crisis, but risk creating dependency and siphoning resources from the homeworld's reserves.

StringTable.Label: Event_ColonialResourceCrisis_Choice_Investigate_Desc
StringTable.String: Launch a thorough investigation into the causes of the resource shortages to find sustainable long-term solutions.

StringTable.Label: Event_ColonialResourceCrisis_Choice_Investigate_Results
StringTable.String: Ongoing Investigation

StringTable.Label: Event_HomeworldPoliticalCrisis_Choice_MartialLaw_Result
StringTable.String: Martial Law

StringTable.Label: Event_ColonialResourceCrisis_Choice_Investigate_Details
StringTable.String: Investigation could uncover inefficiencies or new opportunities; however, the delay may worsen the immediate crisis and create unrest on all our core worlds for a year.

StringTable.Label: Event_ColonialResourceCrisis_Choice_Ignore_Desc
StringTable.String: Stay the course. Colonial ingenuity will prevail without intervention.

StringTable.Label: Event_ColonialResourceCrisis_Choice_Ignore_Details
StringTable.String: Ignoring the problem may uphold economic autonomy, yet it bears the risk of unrest and the potential collapse of vulnerable colonies. A rebellion movement will form.

StringTable.Label: Event_HomeworldPoliticalCrisis_Choice_Negotiate_Result
StringTable.String: Tensions over rapid Colonization

StringTable.Label: Event_InterstellarPoliticalStrain_Name
StringTable.String: Interstellar Political Strain

StringTable.Label: Event_InterstellarPoliticalStrain_Desc
StringTable.String: The rapid expansion of our civilization has led to significant political challenges on the homeworld.[BR][BR]There is a growing concern that we have colonized too fast without the necesssary infrastructure to support all these colonies.[BR][BR]Meanwhile, our citizens on our core worlds are feeling they are being treated as second class citizens.

StringTable.Label: Event_IPS_Choice_DiplomaticIntegration_Desc
StringTable.String: Seek a diplomatic approach to integrate the new worlds, promoting understanding and cooperation.

StringTable.Label: Event_IPS_Choice_DiplomaticIntegration_Details
StringTable.String: This approach may increase overall happiness and trade, but could also lead to slower decision-making, increasing the amount of resources lost in transit.

StringTable.Label: Event_IPS_Choice_DiplomaticIntegration_Result
StringTable.String: Temporary integration policy

StringTable.Label: Event_IPS_Choice_AuthoritarianControl_Desc
StringTable.String: Too bad for the colonists. Impose strict control from the homeworld to ensure uniform governance across our colonies.

StringTable.Label: Event_IPS_Choice_AuthoritarianControl_Results
StringTable.String: Homeworld controls

StringTable.Label: Event_IPS_Choice_AuthoritarianControl_Details
StringTable.String: This might lead to greater efficiency and security, but could also increase unrest in the newly integrated worlds. A rebellion movement is likely to start.

StringTable.Label: Event_IPS_Choice_DecentralizedGovernance_Desc
StringTable.String: Adopt a decentralized governance model, giving new worlds more autonomy.

StringTable.Label: Event_IPS_Choice_DecentralizedGovernance_Details
StringTable.String: While this could lead to increased innovation and local satisfaction, it might also result in weakened central authority.

StringTable.Label: Event_IPS_Choice_DecentralizedGovernance_Result
StringTable.String: Decentralization

StringTable.Label: Event_MultiplanetaryUnityChallenge_Name
StringTable.String: The Multiplanetary Unity Challenge

StringTable.Label: Event_MultiplanetaryUnityChallenge_Desc
StringTable.String: Cultural and political factions across our colonies are seeking varying degrees of autonomy and self-governance. Critics charge that we are engaging in a 'Colony Rush' and we must slow down. [BR][BR]The movement has gained momentum, challenging the central authority's ability to maintain a cohesive governance structure across multiple worlds. How will the leadership address these burgeoning calls for local control?

StringTable.Label: Event_MultiplanetaryUnityChallenge_Choice_Integrate_Desc
StringTable.String: Begin a campaign to reinforce the benefits of a strong central authority.

StringTable.Label: Event_MultiplanetaryUnityChallenge_Choice_Integrate_Result
StringTable.String: Homeworld Unity Pride

StringTable.Label: Event_MultiplanetaryUnityChallenge_Choice_Integrate_Details
StringTable.String: An overarching integration initiative could solidify the empire’s cultural identity but may be perceived as oppressive by advocacy groups seeking independence. It will be popular on the homeworld. For awhile.

StringTable.Label: Event_MultiplanetaryUnityChallenge_Choice_Autonomy_Desc
StringTable.String: Grant greater autonomy to the colonies.

StringTable.Label: Event_MultiplanetaryUnityChallenge_Choice_Autonomy_Details
StringTable.String: Embracing autonomy can empower individual colonies and placate separatist movements, but it will reduce the amount of resources that colonies provide to core worlds even if the core worlds are happier.

StringTable.Label: Event_TerraformingDilemma_Name
StringTable.String: The Terraforming Dilemma

StringTable.Label: Event_TerraformingDilemma_Desc
StringTable.String: Our terraforming efforts have reached a critical juncture. Planetary engineers warn of ecological pushback from the aggressive alteration of entire ecosystems. Meanwhile, colonial settlers yearn for earthlike landscapes that remind them of the homeworld. The path we choose now could seal the fate of our environmental legacy and the biodiversity of new worlds for generations to come.

StringTable.Label: Event_TerraformingDilemma_Choice_Expand_Desc
StringTable.String: Accelerate our terraforming projects to rapidly achieve habitable environments.

StringTable.Label: Event_TerraformingDilemma_Choice_Expand_Details
StringTable.String: Expansion may provide swift habitability gains but could lead to unforeseen ecological disasters and galvanize environmentalist opposition. Will increase the planet quality of {PLANETNAME} by 1.

StringTable.Label: Event_TerraformingDilemma_Choice_Conserve_Desc
StringTable.String: Adopt a conservative approach to terraforming.

StringTable.Label: Event_TerraformingDilemma_Choice_Conserve_Details
StringTable.String: A conservative policy could ensure sustainable development and promote galactic biodiversity. This will temporarily reduce the economic output of our core worlds.

StringTable.Label: Event_TerraformingDilemma_Choice_Conserve_Result
StringTable.String: Careful Terraforming

StringTable.Label: Event_TerraformingDilemma_Choice_Halt_Desc
StringTable.String: Temporarily halt all terraforming activities to reassess their impact and explore alternative means of adaptation.

StringTable.Label: Event_TerraformingDilemma_Choice_Halt_Details
StringTable.String: Halting the projects respects existing ecosystems and could lead to innovations in living on unaltered worlds, but may cause unrest among settlers awaiting terraformed lands. This will dramatically reduce the economic output of our core worlds for awhile..

StringTable.Label: Event_ColonialExodusCrisis_Name
StringTable.String: Colonial Exodus Crisis

StringTable.Label: Event_ColonialExodusCrisis_Desc
StringTable.String: A surge in emigration to new colonies has triggered a population vacuum on our homeworld, causing labor shortages, economic instability, and social unrest. Experts warn that the situation may become unsustainable if not addressed promptly. [BR][BR]You have certainly noticed this. How shall we navigate this delicate demographic conundrum?

StringTable.Label: Event_ColonialExodusCrisis_Choice_Restrict_Desc
StringTable.String: Divert resources from the Shipyard to building up our homeworld for one year.

StringTable.Label: Event_ColonialExodusCrisis_Choice_Incentivize_Desc
StringTable.String: Let's create some clones.

StringTable.Label: Event_ColonialExodusCrisis_Choice_Incentivize_Details
StringTable.String: Adds some clones to our homeworld. This won't make our citizens happy.

StringTable.Label: Event_ColonialExodusCrisis_Choice_Advance_Desc
StringTable.String: Invest in advanced automation and infrastructure to compensate for labor losses.

StringTable.Label: Event_ColonialExodusCrisis_Choice_Advance_Desc_Details
StringTable.String: Provides some automicons to our world. Hopefully they won't rise against us. But they probably will.

StringTable.Label: Event_ColonialExodusCrisis_Choice_Incentivize_Result
StringTable.String: No one likes clones

StringTable.Label: Event_ColonialRushRepercussions_Name
StringTable.String: Colonial Rush Repercussions

StringTable.Label: Event_ColonialRushRepercussions_Desc
StringTable.String: Our rapid colonization has outpaced its societal and infrastructural development, leading to sprawling, undeveloped colonies and overstretched supply chains. How will you address these systemic issues?

StringTable.Label: Event_ColonialRushRepercussions_Choice_Reassess_Desc
StringTable.String: Temporarily reduce further colonization efforts to focus on enhancing the existing colonies, fostering faster growth and integration.

StringTable.Label: Event_ColonialRushRepercussions_Choice_Reassess_Result
StringTable.String: Temporarily Shipyard Moratorium

StringTable.Label: Event_ColonialRushRepercussions_Choice_Reassess_Details
StringTable.String: A moratorium might stabilize your core territories at the expense of losing the initiative in space expansion to rival factions. Our Shipyard production will be dramatically reduced for a year.

StringTable.Label: Event_ColonialRushRepercussions_Choice_Reallocate_Result
StringTable.String: Colonial Reallocation Program

StringTable.Label: Event_ColonialRushRepercussions_Choice_Reallocate_Desc
StringTable.String: Reallocating resources from homeworld to established core worlds.

StringTable.Label: Event_ColonialRushRepercussions_Choice_Reallocate_Details
StringTable.String: This approach will cost a lot of money on our home world for a year but greatly increase production on core worlds for a year.

StringTable.Label: Event_ColonialRushRepercussions_Choice_Protect_Desc
StringTable.String: Implement social policies to protect the vulnerable populations.

StringTable.Label: Event_ColonialRushRepercussions_Choice_Protect_Details
StringTable.String: This policy will cost money for a time but will improve morale for the next year.

StringTable.Label: Event_ColonialRushRepercussions_Choice_Protect_Result
StringTable.String: Temporary Social Policy

StringTable.Label: Event_ColonialRushBacklash_Name
StringTable.String: Colonial Rush Backlash

StringTable.Label: Event_ColonialRushBacklash_Desc
StringTable.String: The rapid colonization of new worlds has led to overextended supply lines, neglected infrastructures, and disgruntled populations. We must take steps to stabilize our burgeoning galactic civilization.

StringTable.Label: Event_ColonialRushBacklash_Choice_Consolidate_Desc
StringTable.String: Focus on strengthening the infrastructure and society of current colonies before embarking on new excursions.

StringTable.Label: Event_ColonialRushBacklash_Choice_Consolidate_Details
StringTable.String: This will cost money for the next year but prevent riots.

StringTable.Label: Event_ColonialRushBacklash_Choice_Redistribution_Desc
StringTable.String: Redistribute resources from core worlds to peripheral colonies to alleviate pressures and inequities caused by hasty expansion.

StringTable.Label: Event_ColonialRushBacklash_Choice_Redistribution_Details
StringTable.String: Resource redistribution will help newly established colonies but could lead to contention and reduced productivity on core worlds.

StringTable.Label: Event_ColonialRushBacklash_Choice_EconomicStimulus_Desc
StringTable.String: Inject capital into fledgling colonies to jumpstart their economies.

StringTable.Label: Event_ColonialRushBacklash_Choice_EconomicStimulus_Details
StringTable.String: An economic boost could hasten the development of new colonies at the risk of sparking inflation and economic bubbles. Core world manufacturing will be increased for two years.

StringTable.Label: Event_FailedAssassinationAttempt_0x523_Name
StringTable.String: Failed Assassination Attempt

StringTable.Label: Event_FailedAssassinationAttempt_0x523_Desc
StringTable.String: A recent assassination attempt on your life has been narrowly thwarted. This incident seems to be a direct result of widespread discontent among our citizens over our aggressive colonization policy. The homeworld is in turmoil, with people divided and fearful. How will you address this crisis and restore order?

StringTable.Label: Event_FailedAssassinationAttempt_0x523_Choice_Investigate_Desc
StringTable.String: Launch a Thorough Investigation

StringTable.Label: Event_FailedAssassinationAttempt_0x523_Choice_Investigate_Details
StringTable.String: By choosing to investigate, you are looking to uncover the mastermind behind the assassination attempt. This might lead to the discovery of a larger conspiracy, but could also draw resources away from other important matters.

StringTable.Label: Event_FailedAssassinationAttempt_0x523_Choice_SecurityIncrease_Desc
StringTable.String: Increase Security Measures

StringTable.Label: Event_FailedAssassinationAttempt_0x523_Choice_SecurityIncrease_Details
StringTable.String: By increasing security measures, you prioritize the immediate safety of yourself and key figures in your administration. This action could reassure the public but may also be seen as an overreaction, potentially causing unrest.

StringTable.Label: Event_FailedAssassinationAttempt_0x523_Choice_SecurityIncrease_Results
StringTable.String: Increased Security

StringTable.Label: NeuralNexusComplex_Name
StringTable.String: Neural Nexus Complex

StringTable.Label: NeuralNexusComplex_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Connects the minds of Yor increasing their intelligence.

StringTable.Label: QuantumProcessingUnit_Name
StringTable.String: Quantum Processing Unit

StringTable.Label: QuantumProcessingUnit_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows core worlds to increase their processing power for greater research.

StringTable.Label: SelfReplicatingFactory_Name
StringTable.String: Self-Replicating Factory

StringTable.Label: SelfReplicatingFactory_ShortDec
StringTable.String: An automated industrial complex that auto generates its own resources.

StringTable.Label: AncientKnowledgeRepository_Name
StringTable.String: Ancient Archive

StringTable.Label: AncientKnowledgeRepository_ShortDec
StringTable.String: A vault of wisdom from bygone eras containing ancient lore.

StringTable.Label: BioDigitalFusionCenter_Name
StringTable.String: Bio-Digital Fusion Center

StringTable.Label: BioDigitalFusionCenter_ShortDec
StringTable.String: By digitizing knowledge, greatly increase our population growth.

StringTable.Label: GalacticDiplomacyHub_Name
StringTable.String: Galactic Diplomacy Hub

StringTable.Label: GalacticDiplomacyHub_ShortDec
StringTable.String: The central nexus for interstellar relations increasing our diplomacy ability.

StringTable.Label: EldersCouncilChamber_Name
StringTable.String: Elders' Council Chamber

StringTable.Label: EldersCouncilChamber_ShortDec
StringTable.String: A revered convocation hall where the wisdom of the ages is convened to guide the future of the civilization.

StringTable.Label: WarriorTrainingGrounds_Name
StringTable.String: Warrior Training Grounds

StringTable.Label: WarriorTrainingGrounds_ShortDec
StringTable.String: A specialized facility dedicated to honing the skills increasing our soldiering ability.

StringTable.Label: DragonMythosPreserve_Name
StringTable.String: Dragon Mythos Preserve

StringTable.Label: DragonMythosPreserve_ShortDec
StringTable.String: A sanctuary safeguarding the ancient traditions and legendary tales of dragons bringing our people together and eliminating crime.

StringTable.Label: TempleOfEnlightenment_Name
StringTable.String: Temple of Enlightenment

StringTable.Label: TempleOfEnlightenment_ShortDec
StringTable.String: A sacred place dedicated to intellectual and spiritual growth increasing the influence of our world.

StringTable.Label: ArcaneSanctuary_Name
StringTable.String: Arcane Sanctuary

StringTable.Label: ArcaneSanctuary_ShortDec
StringTable.String: A secluded retreat for the mystically inclined, where ancient magics and esoteric knowledge converge.

StringTable.Label: CouncilOfSages_Name
StringTable.String: Council of Sages

StringTable.Label: CouncilOfSages_ShortDec
StringTable.String: An assembly of the wisest individuals tasked with preserving and imparting knowledge, offering counsel on matters of great importance.

StringTable.Label: WarMongerAltar_Name
StringTable.String: War Monger's Altar

StringTable.Label: WarMongerAltar_ShortDec
StringTable.String: A sinister shrine dedicated to the glorification of conflict resulting on all ships constructed here being veterans.

StringTable.Label: BattleThrallArena_Name
StringTable.String: Battle Thrall Arena

StringTable.Label: BattleThrallArena_ShortDec
StringTable.String: An arena where our thralls fight and die for our amusement.

StringTable.Label: ExterminationCamps_Name
StringTable.String: Extermination Camps

StringTable.Label: ExterminationCamps_ShortDec
StringTable.String: These efficient camps convert sub-Drengin species into valuable nutrients and other resources to fuel our cleansing of the universe.

StringTable.Label: DrenginUnique_WeaponSystem_Name
StringTable.String: Energy Weapons Amplifier

StringTable.Label: DrenginUnique_WeaponSystem_Dec
StringTable.String: Channels energy to magnify the beam weapon output of other ships in the fleet.

StringTable.Label: Event_ClonesTurningIntoFleshEatingZombies_Name
StringTable.String: Clone Mutation Crisis

StringTable.Label: Event_ClonesTurningIntoFleshEatingZombies_Desc
StringTable.String: In a horrifying turn of events, our efforts to boost population on our homeworld through cloning have backfired. The clones have undergone a drastic and unexpected mutation, turning them into flesh-eating zombies. This epidemic poses a grave threat to the entire homeworld. Immediate action is required to prevent further catastrophe.

StringTable.Label: Event_ClonesTurningIntoFleshEatingZombies_Choice_1_Dec
StringTable.String: Contain and Research the Mutation

StringTable.Label: Event_ClonesTurningIntoFleshEatingZombies_Choice_1_Details
StringTable.String: Our best course of option is to find the zombies and load them onto a colony ship and ship them off somewhere deep into the universe.

StringTable.Label: Event_ColonialStrike_0x8D4_Name
StringTable.String: Colonial Economic Strike

StringTable.Label: Event_ColonialStrike_0x8D4_Desc
StringTable.String: A major strike has broken out across our colonies. The colonists are protesting against our homeworld-centric economic policies, which they feel have neglected their needs and contributions. This widespread unrest demands immediate attention and a reassessment of our policies.

StringTable.Label: Event_ColonialStrike_Choice_1_Desc
StringTable.String: Address the Colonists' Concerns

StringTable.Label: Event_ColonialStrike_Choice_1_Details
StringTable.String: By choosing to address the concerns of the colonists, we acknowledge their grievances and work towards a more equitable distribution of resources and opportunities. This may require rethinking our current economic strategies to prevent future unrest. This will cost us some control.

StringTable.Label: Event_ColonialStrike_Choice_2_Desc
StringTable.String: Crush them.

StringTable.Label: Event_ColonialStrike_Choice_2_Details
StringTable.String: The colonists need to quit thinking of themselves as 'people'. Their whole point is to serve the home world.

StringTable.Label: Event_ColonialStrike_Choice_3_Desc
StringTable.String: Let them strike.

StringTable.Label: Event_ColonialStrike_Choice_3_Details
StringTable.String: The strike will take care of itself. For about a year, however, there will be a lot of crime on our colonies.

StringTable.Label: Event_ColonialStrike_Choice_3_Results
StringTable.String: Colonial Strike.

StringTable.Label: Event_PrecursorAICatastrophe_0x7C4_Name
StringTable.String: Precursor AI Defense Protocol Tragedy

StringTable.Label: Event_PrecursorAICatastrophe_0x7C4_Desc
StringTable.String: In a tragic misunderstanding, the Precursor AI we activated on {PLANETNAME} has identified our own people as intruders and unleashed its defense protocols. This catastrophic misjudgment has resulted in a massive loss of life. We must act swiftly to prevent further disaster.

StringTable.Label: Event_PrecursorAICatastrophe_Choice_Shutdown_Desc
StringTable.String: Immediately Shut Down the AI

StringTable.Label: Event_PrecursorAICatastrophe_Choice_Shutdown_Details
StringTable.String: Shutting down the AI is the only option to immediately cease its fatal protocols. While this stops further loss of life, the decision will remove the benefits the AI provided.

StringTable.Label: Event_HomeworldEfficiencyBoost_0x9A2_Name
StringTable.String: Homeworld Efficiency Investigation is Complete

StringTable.Label: Event_HomeworldEfficiencyBoost_0x9A2_Desc
StringTable.String: Our extensive investigation into enhancing homeworld efficiency has borne fruit. We have developed a series of groundbreaking policies and techniques that will significantly increase our manufacturing capabilities, catapulting our production capacity to new heights.

StringTable.Label: Event_HomeworldEfficiencyBoost_Choice_Implement_Desc
StringTable.String: Implement the New Efficiency Policies

StringTable.Label: Event_HomeworldEfficiencyBoost_Choice_Implement_Details
StringTable.String: By implementing these new policies, we stand on the brink of a manufacturing revolution. This will not only boost our production but also set a new standard for efficiency and innovation on our homeworld.

StringTable.Label: Event_HomeworldEfficiencyBoost_Choice_Implement_Result
StringTable.String: Efficiency Policy

StringTable.Label: Event_CoretapDestabilization_0x8D3_Name
StringTable.String: Planetary Coretap Destabilization

StringTable.Label: Event_CoretapDestabilization_0x8D3_Desc
StringTable.String: The ancient coretap we made use of on {PLANETNAME}, once thought to be a boon, has now caused severe destabilization of our planet's core. This has triggered environmental catastrophes and poses a threat to all life. We must act swiftly to mitigate this disaster.

StringTable.Label: Event_CoretapDestabilization_Choice_Contain_Desc
StringTable.String: Initiate Containment Measures

StringTable.Label: Event_CoretapDestabilization_Choice_Contain_Details
StringTable.String: We will save the planet but it will never be quite the same.

StringTable.Label: Event_DreadLordShipSummoned_0x9C6_Name
StringTable.String: Dread Lord Ship Emergence

StringTable.Label: Event_DreadLordShipSummoned_0x9C6_Desc
StringTable.String: YOu may recall the Dread Lord archive we found on {PLANETNAME}. You may also recall we decided to use it. [BR][BR]Unfortunately, our interaction with the Dread Lord archive has had an unforeseen and alarming consequence. A massive Dread Lord ship has been summoned into a nearby star system. This formidable vessel poses a significant threat to our security and demands immediate attention.

StringTable.Label: Event_DreadLordShipSummoned_Choice_Engage_Desc
StringTable.String: Prepare to Engage the Dread Lord Ship

StringTable.Label: Event_DreadLordShipSummoned_Choice_Engage_Details
StringTable.String: The Dread Lord ship should be easy to find. It will be the one bristling with weapons of death.

StringTable.Label: Event_TerraformingCatastrophe_0xF13_Name
StringTable.String: Catastrophic Terraforming Failure

StringTable.Label: Event_TerraformingCatastrophe_0xF13_Desc
StringTable.String: The reckless approach we took on {PLANETNAME} to terraforming has backfired, leading to a severe ecological collapse on the planet. A massive release of toxic gasses from below the mantle of the planet has killed the entire planet.[BR][BR]While the toxic fumes are short-lived, the death of our colonists is quite real.

StringTable.Label: Event_TerraformingCatastrophe_Choice_Repair_Desc
StringTable.String: We will need to bring new colonists.

StringTable.Label: Event_TerraformingCatastrophe_Choice_Repair_Details
StringTable.String: With all life gone we will have to transport new colonists to the planet.

StringTable.Label: Event_UniversalTranslatorTourism_Name
StringTable.String: Galactic Tourism Initiative

StringTable.Label: Event_UniversalTranslatorTourism_Desc
StringTable.String: The breakthrough in Universal Translator technology has opened a gateway for interspecies communication, turning our planet into a potential hub for interstellar tourism. This presents us with a unique opportunity: to become a crossroads for galactic civilizations, where knowledge, culture, and commerce can be exchanged freely and efficiently. As we contemplate this prospect, we must consider the infrastructural and diplomatic challenges it poses. [BR][BR]Put another way, we have an opportunity to make some tourism income from alien visitors.

StringTable.Label: Event_UniversalTranslatorTourism_Choice_Welcome_Desc
StringTable.String: Let's construct the Galactic Nexus Pavilion

StringTable.Label: Event_UniversalTranslatorTourism_Choice_Welcome_Details
StringTable.String: We should proceed with caution with this as this will make some people very unhappy on our world.

StringTable.Label: Event_UniversalTranslatorTourism_Choice_Reject_Desc
StringTable.String: We are not turning our homeworld into an amusement park.

StringTable.Label: Event_UniversalTranslatorTourism_Choice_Welcome_Results
StringTable.String: Dislike alien tourism policy

StringTable.Label: Event_FearOfContaimination_0x5C3B_Name
StringTable.String: Galactic Contamination Concern

StringTable.Label: Event_FearOfContaimination_0x5C3B_Desc
StringTable.String: There is a wave of revulsion sweeping through our ranks. [BR][BR]The citizenry abhors the very thought of intermingling with the galaxy's lesser beings as a result of our exploration. They dread not just the dilution of our superior genetics but the erosion of our hallowed culture, the tainting of our sacred bloodlines, and the defilement of our ancestral legacies. [BR][BR]The people for look to your decisive leadership to safeguard our purity as we cast our shadow across the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: Event_FearOfContaimination_0x5C3B_Choice_0_Desc
StringTable.String: Implement the Crucible of Pain enhancement on our Homeworld to harden our populace.

StringTable.Label: Event_FearOfContaimination_0x5C3B_Choice_0_Details
StringTable.String: The Crucible of Pain will reinforce our citizens' strength and purity, ensuring the superiority of our kind.

StringTable.Label: Event_FearOfContaimination_0x5C3B_Choice_1_Desc
StringTable.String: Dispatch those who express fear to the front lines in colony ships.

StringTable.Label: Event_FearOfContaimination_0x5C3B_Choice_1_Details
StringTable.String: By facing the unknown, our people will either return victorious or not at all. The weak will be weeded out.

StringTable.Label: Event_FearOfContaimination_0x5C3B_Choice_2_Desc
StringTable.String: Perhaps we should be more open to other species and realize that we are no better than anyone else.

StringTable.Label: Event_FearOfContaimination_0x5C3B_Choice_2_Details
StringTable.String: This controversial decree may be seen as a weakness by many, challenging the very core of our beliefs.

StringTable.Label: Event_FearOfContaimination_0x5C3B_OurLeaderIsAWeakling
StringTable.String: Our leader is a weakling.

StringTable.Label: CrucibleOfPain_Name
StringTable.String: Crucible of Pain

StringTable.Label: CrucibleOfPain_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Turns our weaklings into formidable soldiers.
